channel.description: Recent content in Icf on Benedict Florance

item.title: Indian Railways EMU Production Application
item.description: The application can be found here. Developed the backend service for digitizing the records of inventory management, production planning and status updates of the coaches and rakes under the Digital India initiative. Wrote API’s in Laravel framework to handle authorization across Web and Android clients. The code was reviewed and pushed to production. The Android application has been released on Google Play Store and is used by more than 500 employees of ICF, Chennai for internal purposes.
